featured.text: As such, the dot signifies piety and serves as a constant reminder to keep God in the front of a believer’s thoughts.
The dot goes by different names in different Hindi dialects, and “bindi” is the one that is most commonly known.
Women often wear dots that match the color of their clothes.
Traditionally, the dot carries no gender restriction: Men as well as women wear it.

other.text: Why did people in India start wearing a red dot on their forehead?
Red is the traditional color of the dot.
The red dot represented the blood of God.

definition.en_def: A small round mark or spot.
definition.example: Please put a dot at the end of the sentence.
